compatibility.notes: OLDAP-1.4 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Maintain copyright notices and disclaimers in redistributions.
Provide notice of changes made to the Package.
Ensure that any modified Package does not conflict with standard executables unless renamed.
license.name: OLDAP-1.4
obligations: Duplicate all original copyright notices and associated disclaimers when redistributing verbatim copies.
Insert a prominent notice in each changed file stating how and when it was changed if modifications are made.
Make modifications Freely Available or allow the Copyright Holder to include them in the Standard Version.
